name: Starpatch
description:
☆⌒★⌒☆⌒★⌒☆⌒★⌒☆

A cute and atmospheric Puzzle RPG about a fallen astronaut (and even more fallen stars) and their journey finding safety from the downpour!

Done for GJL Parade Spring 2022, with  the theme 'Every Life Counts'. My first RPGmaker game, this was really fun :]:]:]

☆⌒★⌒☆⌒★⌒☆⌒★⌒☆

 Code, Design and Art by @minkonn (me!)

Credits: 

Dklon (Star Crash SFX)

The Cynic Project (OST Tracks 'Synthwave 15k and 421k')

Juhani Junkala (Various SFX from 'The Essential Retro Video Game Sound Effects Collection')

TSR, The Northern Frog (TSR Title Plugin)

Yanfly (Core Engine Plugin)

Hakuen Studio (FadeColours plugin)

☆⌒★⌒☆⌒★⌒☆⌒★⌒☆

I hope you enjoy!!!（<｀▽´）―━━☆⌒*.⛧`*:

☆⌒★⌒☆⌒★⌒☆⌒★⌒☆
